title: シノビライフ 5
description: It's back to the past for Kagetora and Beni, who are desperate to finally escape her father's manipulations. But when they are separated along the journey, what will happen to Beni, who is now completely on her own, lost a long, long time ago? Kagetora desperately fights to find her once again, but in the meantime, Beni meets some surprising new companions!
author: Shoko Konami
